attribute.description: The javascript which should be executed.
attribute.name: execute

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the behavior, when set to false behavior will not be rendered.
attribute.name: disabled

attribute.description: The name of the event.
attribute.name: event

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a naming container.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: An EL expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: Name of the client side widget.
attribute.name: widgetVar

attribute.description: The target image.
attribute.name: for

attribute.description: A string of the form "width:height" which represents the aspect ratio to maintain. Example: "4:3".
attribute.name: aspectRatio

attribute.description: If set to true, selection area will disappear when selection ends. Default: false.
attribute.name: autoHide

attribute.description: If set to a number greater than zero, showing or hiding the plugin is done with a graceful fade in/fade out animation. Default: 0.
attribute.name: fadeSpeed

attribute.description: If set to true, resize handles are shown on the selection area; if set to "corners", only corner handles are shown. Default: false.
attribute.name: handles

attribute.description: If set to true, selection area is hidden.
attribute.name: hide

attribute.description: True height of the image (if scaled with the CSS width and height properties).
attribute.name: imageHeight

attribute.description: True width of the image (if scaled with the CSS width and height properties).
attribute.name: imageWidth

attribute.description: Determines whether the selection area should be movable. Default: true.
attribute.name: movable

attribute.description: If set to true, clicking outside the selection area will not start a new selection (ie. the user will only be able to move/resize the existing selection area). Default: false.
attribute.name: persistent

attribute.description: Determines whether the selection area should be resizable. Default: true.
attribute.name: resizable

attribute.description: If set to true, selection area is shown.
attribute.name: show

attribute.description: The z-index value to be assigned to plugin elements; normally, imgAreaSelect figures it out automatically, but there are a few cases when it's necessary to set it explicitly.
attribute.name: zIndex

attribute.description: Maximum selection height (in pixels).
attribute.name: maxHeight

attribute.description: Maximum selection width (in pixels).
attribute.name: maxWidth

attribute.description: Minimum selection height (in pixels).
attribute.name: minHeight

attribute.description: Minimum selection width (in pixels).
attribute.name: minWidth

attribute.description: A JSF component Id - A jQuery object or selector string that specifies the parent element that the plugin will be appended to. Default: "body".
attribute.name: imageAreaSelectParent

attribute.description: Enables/disables keyboard support. Default: false.
attribute.name: keyboardSupport

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a naming container.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: An EL expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: Name of the client side widget.
attribute.name: widgetVar

attribute.description: The target image.
attribute.name: for

tag.description: RemoteCommand provides a way to execute JSF backing bean methods directly from javascript.

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: An EL expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: Label of the component.
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: An actionlistener to process when command is executed.
attribute.name: actionListener

attribute.description: A method expression or a string outcome to process when command is executed.
attribute.name: action

attribute.description: Boolean value that determines the phaseId of the action event, when true actions are processed at "Apply Request Values", when false at "Invoke Application" phase.
attribute.name: immediate

attribute.description: Name of the command.
attribute.name: name

attribute.description: Component(s) to update with ajax.
attribute.name: update

attribute.description: Component(s) to process partially instead of whole view.
attribute.name: process

attribute.description: Javascript handler to execute before ajax request is begins.
attribute.name: onstart

attribute.description: Javascript handler to execute when ajax request is completed.
attribute.name: oncomplete

attribute.description: Javascript handler to execute when ajax request fails.
attribute.name: onerror

attribute.description: Javascript handler to execute when ajax request succeeds.
attribute.name: onsuccess

attribute.description: Global ajax requests are listened by ajaxStatus component, setting global to false will not trigger ajaxStatus.
attribute.name: global

attribute.description: When set to true, ajax requests are not queued.
attribute.name: async

tag.description: RemoteCommandParameter can be used the apply a parameter of the RemoteCommand to a backing bean.

attribute.description: Name of the parameter.
attribute.name: name

attribute.description: ValueExpression where the parameter will be applied.
attribute.name: applyTo

attribute.description: An EL expression or a literal text that defines a converter for the component. When it's an EL expression, it's resolved to a converter instance. In case it's a static text, it must refer to a converter id.
attribute.name: converter

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a naming container.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: An EL expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: Data which should be saved in the state.
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: An EL expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: Value of the component than can be either an EL expression of a literal text.
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: An el expression or a literal text that defines a converter for the component.
attribute.name: converter

attribute.description: Name of the client side widget.
attribute.name: widgetVar

attribute.description: A global tooltip converts each title attribute to a tooltip.
attribute.name: global

attribute.description: A shared tooltip - one tooltip, multiple targets.
attribute.name: shared

attribute.description: The corner of the target element to position the tooltip by.
attribute.name: targetPosition

attribute.description: The corner of the tooltip to position the target's position.
attribute.name: position

attribute.description: Event displaying the tooltip.
attribute.name: showEvent

attribute.description: Delay time for displaying the tooltip.
attribute.name: showDelay

attribute.description: Effect to be used for displaying.
attribute.name: showEffect

attribute.description: Time in milliseconds to display the effect.
attribute.name: showEffectLength

attribute.description: Event hiding the tooltip.
attribute.name: hideEvent

attribute.description: Delay time for hiding the tooltip.
attribute.name: hideDelay

attribute.description: Effect to be used for hiding.
attribute.name: hideEffect

attribute.description: Time in milliseconds to process the hide effect.
attribute.name: hideEffectLength

attribute.description: Id of the component to attach the tooltip.
attribute.name: for

attribute.description: jQuery selector for any elements to attach the tooltip.
attribute.name: forSelector
